sentences.en: All together there are six new faces in the cabinet.
sentences.cn: 内阁现在共有6张新面孔。

sentences.en: Bragg weaves together the histories of his main characters.
sentences.cn: 布拉格把他主要人物的身世都串在一起。

sentences.en: Find Bernie and get him to knock an agreement together.
sentences.cn: 找到伯尼，让他尽快拟好一份协议。

sentences.en: He and my father were at school together.
sentences.cn: 他和我父亲一起上过学。

sentences.en: He moved around the room, putting his possessions together.
sentences.cn: 他在屋里走来走去，忙着把自己的东西放在一起。

sentences.en: I need to have the top people in this company pull together.
sentences.cn: 我需要将公司的最高层团结起来。

sentences.en: In graphite sheets, carbon atoms bond together in rings.
sentences.cn: 石墨层中的碳原子相互连接形成碳环。

sentences.en: Let me now pull together the threads of my argument.
sentences.cn: 现在让我来将我的论点串起来。

sentences.en: The man did one helluva job getting it all together.
sentences.cn: 这家伙把事情全都料理妥当了，真是干得不错。

sentences.en: their meal arrived, together with a carafe of red wine.
sentences.cn: 他们的菜上来了，还有一瓶红葡萄酒。

sentences.en: They attended college together at the University of Pennsylvania.
sentences.cn: 他们一起就读于宾夕法尼亚大学。

sentences.en: They were knocking around together for about a year.
sentences.cn: 他们交往大概有一年了。

sentences.en: They're trying their best to bring together those separated families.
sentences.cn: 他们正尽最大的努力让离散的家人重聚。

sentences.en: They’ve decided to spend more time together.
sentences.cn: 他们决定要花更多时间在一起。

sentences.en: Together they went back inside the villa.
sentences.cn: 他们一起回到了别墅里。

sentences.en: We got to work on putting the book together.
sentences.cn: 我们得努力编成这本书。

sentences.en: We may all be snowed in here together for days.
sentences.cn: 我们可能要一起被大雪困在这里好几天。

sentences.en: We'll put together a proposal, including detailed costings, free of charge.
sentences.cn: 我们将免费拟一份提案，其中包括详细的成本估算。

sentences.en: We’ve very much enjoyed working together .
sentences.cn: 我们在一起工作非常开心。

sentences.en: You can cobble it together from any old combination of garments.
sentences.cn: 把以前的衣服随便搭配一下就能拼凑出一套。

words.tran_cn: 相聚，家庭聚会；团结精神；归属感
新潮的；情绪稳定的，做事有效率的

phrases.phrase: get it all together 或 put it all together &I{【俚语】}
phrases.tran_cn: 集中心思：联合和协调自己的力量以最大的效率行动
保持镇定（等于get it all together）；信息汇总

trans.tran_cn: 一起，共同，(接触、结合)到一起，关系密切的，一致，协调，同时，合计地，不间断地
trans.tran_en: if two or more people do something together, they do it with each other
if two or more people do something together, they do it with each other
